Article Title: 'Nahi jitega to bandook tumhari taraf': Ravi Shastri's fiery message to Gautam Gambhir ‚Äì WATCH
Article Text:
Gautam Gambhir (AFP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Gautam Gambhir Press Conference: Team India head coach heaves fire after 2-1 ODI series win over SA

NEW DELHI: India head coach Gautam Gambhir is under increasing scrutiny after consecutive home Test series defeats, despite enjoying early success with India‚Äôs Champions Trophy and Asia Cup wins since taking charge in July last year. The team‚Äôs struggles in red-ball cricket ‚Äî including a 3-0 loss to New Zealand followed by a 2-0 defeat against South Africa ‚Äî have raised alarms, especially as India have been whitewashed in a home Test series only three times in history, with two of those coming during Gambhir‚Äôs stint.However, former India head coach Ravi Shastri believes criticism should not be directed at just one individual. Speaking on Prabhat Khabar‚Äôs YouTube podcast, he urged a broader view of accountability."So when results come, one thing the public should remember is that players should also take responsibility. It should not be that you target one individual. It has happened to me, that is why I am speaking from experience. So it is important that the players also take the rap on the knuckles when something like this happens. There should be pride. They should feel hurt that we have lost. Until that happens, things will not move forward," he said."Har match jitna hai. Nahi jitega to bandook tumhari taraf. Agar ye mere saath hota to mai pehle responsibility leta. Wo pride hona chaiye. Hurt hona chaiye ki hum haare hain. Pressure sabko aata hai. Jhelna padta hai. Cricket is 90 percent here in the mind [We have to win every match. If we don‚Äôt win, the gun will point at you. If this had happened with me, I would have taken responsibility first. There should be pride. You should feel hurt that we have lost. Everyone feels pressure. You have to deal with it. Cricket is 90 percent here ‚Äî in the mind]," Shastri said.Shastri also highlighted the importance of leadership qualities beyond tactics."If your performance is poor, you could be fired. Therefore, you need to maintain patience. Communication and man-management skills are crucial here. Only then can you motivate the players to win. And that's what we did. The most important thing is to enjoy whatever you do. Don't take it as pressure," he explained.Drawing from his time overseeing India‚Äôs dominant Test period between 2014 and 2021, Shastri stressed that defeats should be viewed collectively.Watch the video here "Everyone, right from the team management to the players, you can't single out one person. It's a collective decision. South Africa defeated India; no single player defeated India. South Africa played well as a team. Where did we play?" he questioned.While he avoided directly criticising Gambhir, Shastri reiterated shared accountability for the recent slump.India‚Äôs first-ever home Test whitewash took place in 1999‚Äì2000, also against South Africa ‚Äî a reminder of how rare such setbacks have been.
Article Summary: Gautam gambhir under increasing scrutiny after consecutive home test series defeats. Former india head coach ravi shastri believes criticism should not be directed at just one individual. India have been whitewashed in a home testseries only three times in history.

Article Title: Serena Williams and Venus Williams combined net worth in 2025: Tennis sisters, earnings, endorsements, business, career and more
Article Text:
Serena Williams and Venus Williams combined net worth in 2025: Tennis sisters, earnings, endorsements, business, career and more (Image via Getty)

Serena Williams and Venus Williams net worth in 2025

Serena Williams tennis earnings and prize money

Venus Williams tennis earnings and prize money

Serena Williams endorsements and business work

Venus Williams endorsements and business work

Serena Williams and Venus Williams are two of the most famous sisters in sports. They are great tennis players and also very strong businesswomen. In 2025, trusted reports say Serena‚Äôs net worth is about 350 million dollars, and Venus‚Äôs net worth is about 90‚Äì95 million dollars. This means their combined net worth is around 440‚Äì445 million dollars. They make money from tennis, brand deals, business work, and smart investments. They stay very active even after many years in the sport.Forbes lists Serena Williams with a net worth of about 350 million dollars in 2025. This comes from her prize money, big brand deals, and her investment company.Business Insider reports that Venus Williams is worth 90‚Äì95 million dollars. When we put the numbers together, the sisters are worth 440‚Äì445 million dollars, making them one of the richest sister teams in world sports.Serena won 23 Grand Slam singles titles, the most in modern women‚Äôs tennis. The WTA confirms she earned about 94.8 million dollars in prize money, which is the highest amount ever for a woman tennis player.Her long run at the top of the sport helped her build a very strong financial base that still grows today through her businesses.According to the WTA, Venus Williams has earned around 42 million dollars in prize money during her more than 30-year tennis career. She won 7 Grand Slam singles titles and many more in doubles with Serena. Her long time in the sport helped her earn steady money and build her own business path.Serena Williams has worked with Nike, Gatorade, Wilson, Rolex, Beats by Dre, and many more big brands. In 2025, she became a global ambassador for Ro, a major health company, which Ro confirmed on its official site.Serena also runs Serena Ventures, which has invested in 70‚Äì85 startups, including several unicorns worth more than 1 billion dollars. She also launched WYN Beauty and has a small stake in the new WNBA team in Toronto.Venus Williams has worked with brands like Nike, Gatorade, Wilson, and Porsche. She owns the activewear brand EleVen and her interior design company V Starr. Reports say these brands bring in strong money each year.In 2025, the tennis sisters also worked on a new video podcast set to release on X, giving fans a new way to see them together.Also Read: Aryna Sabalenka and Georgios Frangulis combined net worth: Tennis earnings, endorsements, business, relationship and more
Article Summary: Serena williams and venus williams are two of the most famous sisters in sports. They are great tennis players and also very strong businesswomen. In 2025, trusted reports say serena‚Äôs net worth is about 350 million dollars. This means their combined networth is around 440‚Äì445 million dollars, making them one of the richest sister teams in world sports.

Article Title: WWE RAW preview and streaming details 8-dec-2025: Full match card, confirmed segments, how to watch, start timings & how to watch
Article Text:
Image via WWE

AJ Styles & Dragon Lee (c) vs The War Raiders (Erik & Ivar) ‚Äì WWE World Tag Team titles match

Rey Mysterio vs Finn Balor

Gunther to appear on RAW

Lyra Valkyria vs Roxanne Perez

Gunther will make an appearance



WWE World Tag Team title match



Lyra Valkyria will battle Roxanne Perez



Rey Mysterio will compete against Finn Balor

How to watch WWE RAW (December 8)?



WWE RAW will air its December 8 edition of the show from the T-Mobile Center in Kansas City. The show will be the go-home edition before WWE Saturday Night's Main Event, which will mark John Cena's final match. His opponent, Gunther, is set to make an appearance on RAW, plus some high-octane action is also scheduled for the event, promising an exciting edition of Monday Night RAW.The winner of The Last Time is Now tournament, Gunther, is set to make an appearance on RAW this week. With a chance of a lifetime to retire, The GOAT John Cena, it will be interesting to hear what The Ring General has to say regarding his upcoming showdown with Cena at WWE Saturday Night's Main Event.After a successful title defense against The New Day last week, AJ Styles and Dragon Lee got to handpick their next opponents for the WWE World Tag Team Championships. They chose Erik and Ivar, The War Raiders, with the match scheduled to take place this week.Amid the competition heating up in the tag team division, Judgment Day's Roxanne Perez will square off against Lyra Valkyria in singles action on RAW.Rey Mysterio is once again in the crosshairs of The Judgment Day, reigniting tensions with his son, Dominik Mysterio.The Master of the 619 will battle Dominik's cohort, Finn Balor, in a one-on-one showdown this week on Monday Night RAW.WWE RAW will air live in the United States at 08 PM ET and 05 PM PT on Netflix on Monday, while the UK and Ireland fans can catch the action at 1 AM BST. In Canada, the show broadcasts live at 08 PM ET on Monday on Netflix. In India, fans can watch RAW live on Netflix at 6:30 AM IST on Tuesday. Fans in Saudi Arabia can watch RAW live on Netflix at 4:00 AM AST on Tuesday. In France, fans can tune into RAW this week at 02:00 AM CET every Tuesday on AB1. Fans in Australia can see RAW this week at 12:00 AM AEST on Tuesday on Netflix.Also read: John Cena's final WWE opponent revealed on SmackDown
Article Summary: Wwe raw will air its december 8 edition of the show from the t-mobile center in kansas city. The show will be the go-home edition before wwe saturday night's main event, which will mark john cena's final match. The winner of the last time is now tournament, gunther, is set to make an appearance on raw this week.

Article Title: The thong Shedeur Sanders accidentally flashed ‚Äòhelps him run faster‚Äô according to fan conspiracy theories after viral brief wardrobe slip
Article Text:
Shedeur Sanders‚Äô brief wardrobe slip during the Browns vs Titans game sparked fan conspiracy theories and overshadowed his four touchdown performance. (Images via Twitter)

Viral clip of Shedeur Sanders becomes the main story as fans and people debate the ‚Äúthong‚Äù moment

Equipment experts confirm Shedeur Sanders was wearing a standard NFL jockstrap during the Titans game

Shedeur Sanders delivers a four touchdown performance while the Browns lose and the discourse derails completely

Shedeur Sanders became the center of the NFL‚Äôs strangest viral moment on Monday Night Football after a broadcast replay caught the Cleveland Browns rookie in an unplanned wardrobe slip. The clip spread across social platforms within minutes and sparked a full internet spiral about what he was wearing under his uniform.Shedeur Sanders threw four total touchdowns in the 31-29 loss to the Tennessee Titans, but the conversation moved away from his production and focused on a two second shot that fans turned into a meme factory. Social media pushed one question louder than anything that happened in the game itself, and the fallout has fully overshadowed his stat line.The moment happened in the fourth quarter when Tennessee Titans defensive tackle T‚ÄôVondre Sweat dragged Shedeur Sanders down near the goal line. His uniform pants shifted as he hit the turf. The back strap of his underwear appeared on the broadcast camera. The exposure lasted less than two seconds, but the replay angle captured it clearly enough for the internet to screen grab, zoom, repost, and stitch it across every platform available.Within minutes, clips on X, TikTok, and Reddit labeled the angle as evidence that he was wearing a thong. One viral reaction read, ‚ÄúBRO, was Shedeur Sanders wearing a thong?‚Äù Another user added, ‚ÄúPlease tell me we don‚Äôt have Watson 2.0 lol.‚Äù A third post joked, ‚ÄúThe thing gonna thong,‚Äù which quickly became the unofficial tagline of the moment. Fans kept uploading slow motion edits and cropped zooms, treating the frame like a detective assignment.TPS amplified the conversation by highlighting screenshots where fans wrote, "Bro is Shedeur Sanders wearing a thong???üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠" and "Is Shedeur Sanders wearing a thongü§£."Amid the internet frenzy, reporters and equipment specialists stepped in with the actual explanation. The visible strap was part of a standard athletic jockstrap, not lingerie. The gear has been common across contact sports for decades. It has an elastic waistband, a protective front pouch, and two straps that run under the buttocks. Those straps leave part of the area uncovered to prevent bulk under pads and allow mobility.High definition replays made the strap look similar to a thong. That optical confusion sustained the jokes even after multiple journalists clarified the equipment. Many fans admitted they had never seen what a jockstrap looks like when a player falls at a certain angle. One viewer responded with a simple line that summed up the tone of the discourse: ‚ÄúThat is very weird.‚ÄùThe misunderstanding did not fade overnight. The clip kept circulating the next morning and remained one of the most shared NFL moments of the day even though it had nothing to do with gameplay.Shedeur Sanders threw for 364 yards, three passing touchdowns, and added his first NFL rushing touchdown in the game. He pushed the Cleveland Browns back into contention late in the fourth quarter. The team trailed 31-17 when he scrambled for a seven yard score. He later led an 80 yard touchdown drive to cut the Tennessee Titans lead to two points.Cleveland faced a potential game tying moment with a two point conversion. The Browns removed Shedeur Sanders from the field and ran a direct snap to running back Quinshon Judkins. The play failed. The Titans secured the 31-29 win and improved to 2-11. The Browns fell to 3-10, and both teams remained out of playoff contention.After the loss, Shedeur Sanders said, ‚ÄúI‚Äôve been this way,‚Äù when asked about the late push and his confidence despite the noise surrounding the moment.Shedeur Sanders entered the league with heavy scrutiny after his draft slide and early season questions about Cleveland‚Äôs decision making with him in critical moments. The online reaction to the jockstrap clip has now overshadowed a productive performance that should have been the focus. Conversations about his mechanics, decision making, and late game execution took a back seat to a viral freeze frame.Instead of discussing his four touchdowns or his rally attempts, the public conversation shifted to a misunderstanding about protective equipment. The Browns have a short turnaround and a difficult schedule ahead, and Shedeur Sanders now has to answer for a moment that should never have turned into the main story of the night.
Article Summary: Shedeur sanders threw four touchdowns in the browns' 31-29 loss to the tennessee titans. But the conversation moved away from his production and focused on a two second shot that fans turned into a meme factory. The visible strap was part of a standard athletic jockstrap, not lingerie.

Article Title: ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs like a pitbull‚Äù: Micah Parsons praises Keisean Nixon after game-saving interception seals Packers‚Äô win over Bears
Article Text:
Micah Parsons praises Keisean Nixon‚Äôs game-saving INT (Image via: Getty Images)

Micah Parsons‚Äô fiery praise for Keisean Nixon after pick on Caleb Williams‚Äô last-second throw



The Packers and Bears delivered an exciting showdown on Sunday, keeping fans on the edge of their seats from start to finish. Both teams traded big plays and multiple touchdowns, making it a back-and-forth battle that came down to the final seconds. Every yard mattered, and the intensity of the matchup reflected the fierce rivalry between these divisional foes. The energy inside the stadium matched the high stakes as neither side showed signs of backing down.When the clock ticked down to 22 seconds, Green Bay‚Äôs defense rose to the occasion. Cornerback Keisean Nixon made a jaw-dropping interception in the end zone, stopping Chicago rookie Caleb Williams from pulling off a last-minute upset. The play not only secured the Packers‚Äô hard-fought win but also instantly became one of the most talked-about moments of the week.After the game, star linebacker Micah Parsons did not hold back his admiration for Nixon‚Äôs performance. ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs got a little short-man syndrome, he‚Äôs a scrappy mother****,‚Äù Parsons said. ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs small in size, but he‚Äôs like a pitbull.‚Äù Parsons‚Äô comments highlight Nixon‚Äôs relentlessness and fearless approach on the field, proving that size doesn‚Äôt dictate impact.Nixon‚Äôs interception showcased more than individual talent; it emphasized the Packers‚Äô defensive grit. Despite allowing multiple touchdown drives, the unit remained composed and aggressive in critical moments. Analysts have noted that Nixon‚Äôs emergence adds a dynamic edge to the Packers‚Äô secondary, giving the team confidence against high-powered offenses moving forward.Looking ahead, Green Bay will take this momentum on the road for a key matchup against the Denver Broncos next Sunday. Kickoff is scheduled for 3:25 p.m. CT on CBS. With Nixon‚Äôs performance as a spark and Parsons‚Äô leadership fueling the defense, the Packers aim to maintain their winning streak and strengthen their playoff position.Keisean Nixon‚Äôs game-saving interception was more than a highlight; it was a statement. It underlined the Packers‚Äô resilience, the potency of their defensive unit, and the rise of a player who refuses to be underestimated, proving that sometimes the fiercest plays come from the most scrappy competitors.Also Read: Daniel Jones injury update: NFL insider shares concerning news as Colts‚Äô quarterback ‚Äúclearly not 100 percent‚Äù
Article Summary: Micah parsons praises keisean nixon‚Äôs game-saving int. Nixon made a jaw-dropping interception in the end zone, stopping chicago rookie caleb williams from pulling off a last-minute upset. The play not only secured the packers‚Äô hard-fought win but also instantly became one of the most talked-about moments of the week.

Article Title: Inside the fairytale life George Springer shares with his wife Charlise Castro who built her own path before the spotlight
Article Text:
George Springer with his wife Charlise Castro (Image via: IG/X)

How Charlise Castro shaped her own career rather than being just a baseball wife

How George Springer and Charlise Castro's relationship grew through hard work and understanding

Charlise Castro‚Äôs life shows how identity and love can coexist for sports families

Charlise Castro‚Äôs life story reads far beyond the tag of being married to Toronto Blue Jays right fielder George Springer. She was a college standout long before she walked down the aisle, earning respect for her talent in softball and her later success in the wellness field. Her journey offers a look at how partners of elite athletes build their own paths while living in a world dominated by bright stadium lights and constant attention. Castro‚Äôs growth reflects ambition, resilience, and a firm belief that her identity deserves its own spotlight.Castro‚Äôs athletic journey began at the University at Albany where her strength at the plate turned her into a force in Division I softball. Her scholarship was earned, her achievements were celebrated, and her award as America East Player of the Year stamped her influence as one of the best young hitters in the country. Her selection to Puerto Rico‚Äôs national team only elevated her visibility, showing she could compete internationally. Yet her switch from professional play to personal development shows how she values reinvention over comfort.After graduating, Castro chose personal growth over lingering nostalgia for sport. She earned an MBA from the University of Saint Rose, taking her knowledge from the field into classrooms and business settings.That shift positioned her for a career in health, fitness, and wellness coaching where she could help others find confidence and balance. Her evolution showcases how athletes can turn discipline into leadership and passion into service.Castro has developed a quiet but credible space in the wellness world where she blends her business skills with lived athletic experience. Instead of promoting glamour without substance, she uses her platform to guide people toward stronger lifestyles. Even with Springer‚Äôs fame attracting followers, Castro‚Äôs work stands on its own credibility, supported by years of sport and education. She projects independence in a world where athlete spouses are often expected to stand behind.Castro first met Springer in 2011 when both were student athletes determining their futures. They bonded over long training days, competitive pressure, and goals that required sacrifice and patience. When Springer chased the majors, Castro chased academic achievement, creating parallel pursuits rather than one supporting role. Their connection deepened through understanding rather than dependency.The couple married in January 2018 in Newport Beach, California, in a setting suitable for two people balancing spotlight and family. The years since brought travel, clubhouse life, new homes, and eventually parenthood as they welcomed two children into the fold. Castro‚Äôs ability to nurture home life while working shows how she and Springer operate as a team, not as celebrity center and shadow. Their relationship reflects mutual ambition wrapped in family values.Today, Castro represents the changing narrative of partners in professional sports where wives create personal value instead of standing as silent figures on camera. Her athletic roots, career achievements, and steady role in Springer‚Äôs life make her part of his story without being overshadowed by it. Her journey is a reminder that balanced relationships in sports are built on choice, effort, and equal dreams. For George Springer, she remains his biggest supporter but also his truest match in drive and determination. Their story reminds everyone that shared ambition can build a lasting bond.Also read: Freddie Freeman and Ryan Reynolds‚Äô SickKids video goes viral as fans explode with hilarious reactions online
Article Summary: Charlise castro is the wife of toronto blue jays right fielder george springer. She was a college standout in softball and later moved into the wellness field. Castro‚Äôs growth reflects ambition, resilience, and a firm belief that her identity deserves its own spotlight.

Article Title: Will Campbell injury update: Coach Mike Vrabel reveals rookie left tackle‚Äôs recovery progress, says ‚Äúso far, so good‚Äù
Article Text:
Patriots‚Äô Will Campbell shows encouraging recovery (Image via: Getty Images)

Patriots‚Äô positive signs on Will Campbell‚Äôs recovery



'Secret Sauce' Following BYE- Patriots HC Mike Vrabel Joins! Campbell Update? ||The Greg Hill Show

The New England Patriots received some encouraging news regarding rookie left tackle Will Campbell, who has been sidelined since Week 12 due to an MCL sprain. Campbell missed the team‚Äôs Week 13 matchup against the Cincinnati Bengals, and his placement on injured reserve meant he would be out for at least the next three games, with the Week 14 bye not counting toward the minimum four-week IR stay. For a team navigating a critical stretch of the regular season, any positive sign of recovery is a huge boost.While the initial injury reports were alarming, there is reason for optimism. Sports Illustrated‚Äôs Albert Breer had labeled the injury a Grade 3 MCL sprain, suggesting a severe tear. However, recent observations indicate that Campbell‚Äôs progress may be better than expected. Patriots head coach Mike Vrabel offered an update that has fans hopeful, signaling that the rookie left tackle‚Äôs comeback could align well with the team‚Äôs playoff push.On the first practice following the team‚Äôs bye week, Campbell was seen walking through the locker room with no brace on his knee, later putting on only a sleeve. This simple detail suggests that the MCL sprain may not be as severe as initially feared. ‚ÄúSo far, so good,‚Äù Coach Mike Vrabel said regarding Campbell‚Äôs recovery.Typically, an MCL sprain requires four to six weeks of recovery, depending on severity. If Campbell follows the shorter end of this timeline, he could return for the Week 18 regular-season finale, giving him time to regain his rhythm before the playoffs.On the other hand, if the recovery takes longer, the Patriots may need to carefully manage his return in postseason play.Securing the No. 1 seed would provide an additional week of rest, giving Campbell a better chance to return at full strength. For now, the visual progress and Vrabel‚Äôs positive comments offer reassurance that the team‚Äôs rookie left tackle is trending in the right direction. As the Patriots continue their late-season push, Campbell‚Äôs eventual return could prove crucial in protecting the quarterback and solidifying the offensive line for the postseason.Also Read: Josh Simmons injury update: NFL insider provides key details on Chiefs LT‚Äôs status after concerning week 13 setback
Article Summary: The new england patriots received some encouraging news regarding rookie left tackle will campbell. Campbell missed the team‚Äôs week 13 matchup against the cincinnati bengals due to an mcl sprain. ‚Äúso far, so good,‚Äù coach mike vrabel said regarding campbell's recovery.

Article Title: Victor Wembanyama return update: San Antonio Spurs legend nears stunning return as team awaits its towering superstar
Article Text:
Victor Wembanyama is eager to make a comeback (Image via Getty Images)

Spurs stay hopeful as Victor Wembanyama‚Äôs long-awaited return inches closer

San Antonio thrives without Wemby but eagerly awaits his dominant comeback

Victor Wembanyama of the San Antonio Spurs has missed the past ten games while recovering from a calf strain. The Spurs have maintained their hot start, sitting seventh in the Western Conference with a 15-7 record. But San Antonio isn't the same without the awe-inspiring Wembanyama, who could be returning after a three-week hiatus.Wembanyama hasn't played since November 14 due to a left calf issue, but he appears to be close to returning to action. McDonald had stated that Wembanyama was unlikely to play at all during the NBA Cup consolation schedule, ruling the superstar out of Monday's game in New Orleans and Wednesday's road game against the Lakers.The 7-foot-5 French great was once again leading the league in blocks, averaging career highs in many key statistical categories, and the San Antonio Spurs were positioned as early Western Conference contenders.However, according to veteran beat reporter Jeff McDonald of the San Antonio Express-News, Wembanyama will miss the Spurs' 11th consecutive game on Monday night, when they face the Pelicans in New Orleans.Wembanyama is classified as out on the Spurs injury report for their game against the New Orleans Pelicans on Monday, December 8. He is likely to miss his eleventh consecutive game. However, Wembanyama took full part in Sunday's practice. According to McDonald, Wemby will be deemed "iffy" to play Wednesday when the Spurs face the Los Angeles Lakers in an NBA Cup quarterfinal.However, according to Jeff McDonald of the San Antonio Express-News, Wembanyama (calf) participated fully in Sunday's practice. Wembanyama participated in Sunday's practice, and McDonald reports that the third-year prodigy is "iffy" for Wednesday's game, but unlikely to play Monday.While the information is optimistic for Wembanyama, it is unclear when he will suit up again. Following the two NBA Cup games, the Spurs played at home against the Wizards on December 17.Following Wednesday's 114-112 victory over the Orlando Magic, the Spurs hold the NBA's eighth-best offensive rating at 119.4. They had the league's ninth-best assist-to-turnover ratio at 2.0 after Wembanyama left with a strained calf, after ranking 23rd in the previous 12 games with him.San Antonio is 7-3 without Wembanyama and will need to go at least one more game without the All-Star center. However, they are on the verge of finally welcoming the 7 '5'' superstar back into the fold. In 12 games this season, Wembanyama has averaged 26.2 points, 12.9 rebounds, 4.0 assists, and 3.6 blocks. He won't turn 22 until January.Also read: What is Victor Wembanyama‚Äôs net worth? Salary and endorsement deals explored as the NBA icon reportedly urges San Antonio Spurs for more help
Article Summary: Victor wembanyama hasn't played since november 14 due to a left calf issue. The 7-foot-5 french great was once again leading the league in blocks, averaging career highs in many key statistical categories. The spurs have maintained their hot start, sitting seventh in the western conference with a 15-7 record.

Article Title: Why did police shoot former Memphis Tigers football player? Officer shooting in Georgia leaves La‚ÄôAndre Thomas dead
Article Text:
Why did police shoot former Memphis Tigers football player? Officer shooting in Georgia leaves La‚ÄôAndre Thomas dead (Image Via Getty)



La‚ÄôAndre Thomas identified after reported assault in Sandy Springs on December 4

La‚ÄôAndre Thomas, a former Memphis Tigers football defensive back, died after a police shooting in Sandy Springs, Georgia, on Thursday, December 4, 2025. He was 27 years old and from Jackson, Mississippi. The Georgia Bureau of Investigation (GBI) said he was shot by an officer after a reported assault call in the area that morning.La‚ÄôAndre Thomas played college football for the University of Memphis from 2017 to 2019. Memphis Athletics records show he appeared in 30 games for the Tigers and started all 14 games in 2019, when he made 63 total tackles. Former teammates and fans online have been sharing old photos and messages, remembering him as a tough player and a quiet teammate who loved football.According to the Georgia Bureau of Investigation, officers from the Sandy Springs Police Department were called to Dunwoody Place in Sandy Springs, Georgia, around 10:30 a.m. on Thursday, December 4, 2025.A woman told officers that a man had assaulted her while she was walking her dog in the area. The GBI said officers checked security cameras nearby and later identified La‚ÄôAndre Thomas as the man seen in the video.A short time later, Sandy Springs officers approached La‚ÄôAndre Thomas at a bus stop close to where the assault was reported.Investigators said that while officers were speaking with La‚ÄôAndre Thomas, he pulled a handgun from his waistband. At that moment, one officer fired his weapon and shot La‚ÄôAndre Thomas.The GBI said officers then called for medical help, and La‚ÄôAndre Thomas was taken to a nearby hospital in critical condition. He was afterward declared dead at the hospital.La'Andre Thomas's body will be turned over to the Fulton County Medical Examiner's Office in Georgia for autopsy, said the Georgia Bureau of Investigation.The GBI said it would give its results to the local district attorney once the probe into the shooting is finished.It is now conducting an independent inquiry. People in Memphis have also been reflecting back on his days with the Tigers.Memphis Athletics reports indicate that an injury limited La'Andre Thomas to four games in 2018; nevertheless, he still concluded his college career strong in 2019.Many inside the program are now eager to know more about the incident in Georgia and the course the case will take.Also Read: ‚ÄúWhite House Is On‚Äù: Conor McGregor Calls Out Islam Makhachev As He Aims For The UFC 170-Pound Welterweight Belt Next
Article Summary: La‚Äôandre thomas, a former memphis tigers football defensive back, died after a police shooting in sandy springs, georgia, on thursday, december 4, 2025. He was 27 years old and from jackson, mississippi. Georgia bureau of investigation said he was shot by an officer after a reported assault call in the area.

Article Title: Justin Herbert injury update: Insider reveals QB‚Äôs status for Eagles clash amid panic over recent surgery
Article Text:
All eyes are on Justin Herbert's return to the field.(Image via AP)

NFL insider opens up about Justin Herbert‚Äôs injury and availability as the Los Angeles Chargers gear up to face the Philadelphia Eagles





Justin Herbert has confirmed his desire to return to the field on Monday night





The Los Angeles Chargers‚Äô star player, Justin Herbert, sustained a brutal injury to his left hand and even had to undergo surgery for it which had sparked panic.As the Los Angeles Chargers gear up to face the Philadelphia Eagles, popular NFL insider ESPN‚Äôs Jeremy Fowler has provided an update on Justin Herbert‚Äôs availability for the upcoming match.A few hours ago, ESPN‚Äôs Jeremy Fowler wrote, "People I've talked to there believe (Herbert) is going to be good to go‚Ä¶‚ÄùThe popular NFL insider added, ‚ÄúThey are optimistic."In the last few days, Justin Herbert has also been a limited participant for the upcoming match against the Philadelphia Eagles.As per the latest injury report of the Los Angeles Chargers, Justin Herbert is listed as questionable for Monday night‚Äôs match but rumors suggest that he might be taking the field on Monday.However, neither the team, the Los Angeles Chargers, nor Justin Hebert has confirmed his return to the field on Monday.A few days ago, after Justin Herbert went through his surgery, he opened up about his desire to return to the field as soon as possible.The Los Angeles Chargers‚Äô quarterback said, "They just put a hard cast on it, put a glove around it. I think that was basically it. I'm treating it as if I'm playing on Monday. I think they were very hopeful for that‚Ä¶‚ÄùJustin Herbert added, ‚ÄúI think that's something that we'll see [Monday] and we'll get a feel for.I think they were very hopeful so that's always a good thing."The Los Angeles Chargers‚Äô head coach, John Harbaugh, also opened up about Justin Herbert and said, "He's as tough as they come. Taped it up, glove and played a great game."The Los Angeles Chargers have recorded a pretty strong performance this season as the team has only lost four out of the twelve matches played so far.Even in the last five matches, the Los Angeles Chargers have easily managed to win four matches as the team defeated the Minnesota Vikings, the Tennessee Titans, the Pittsburgh Steelers and the Las Vegas Raiders.Also Read: ‚ÄúLowest low of my life‚Äù: Aaron Rodgers‚Äô ex fianc√©e Shailene Woodley‚Äôs heartbreaking words resurfaces as mystery around his marriage deepens
Article Summary: Nfl insider opens up about justin herbert‚Äôs injury and availability as the los angeles chargers gear up to face the philadelphia eagles. A few days ago, after justin herbert went through his surgery, he opened up about his desire to return to the field as soon as possible.

Article Title: Magic Johnson showers heartfelt praise for LeBron James following game winning performance against 76ers
Article Text:
Magic Johnson and LeBron James. Image via: Ronald Martinez - Getty Iamges

LeBron James delivers a crown worthy performance

LeBron James is a legend both on and off the court

The Los Angeles Lakers travelled all the way to Wells Fargo Centre, needing a spark after their 105-126 loss to the Boston Celtics. And LeBron James made sure they didn‚Äôt leave without one. In a closely contested 112‚Äì108 victory over the 76ers, the superstar delivered another reminder that age and injuries may slow him down, but they haven‚Äôt dimmed his brilliance.The win didn‚Äôt just energize the fanbase, it also caught the attention of Lakers legend and NBA icon Magic Johnson, who rarely misses an opportunity to hype up a team that reminds him of the electric Showtime era. He called this Lakers roster ‚Äúthe most entertaining team in the NBA right now.‚ÄùDespite missing the last game due to sciatica, the same reason that forced him to miss the first 14 games, and lingering left foot arthritis, Lebron James played for 34 minutes and put up 29 points, 7 rebounds, and 6 assists, including a remarkable fourth-quarter stretch in which he poured in 11 consecutive points. Three straight three-pointers ignited the Lakers‚Äô bench and silenced a hostile Philly crowd, proving once again that he can still take over games whenever he chooses.Luka Doncic, meanwhile, added his own masterpiece, a 31 points, 15 rebounds, 11 assists, triple-double, helping the Lakers improve to 17‚Äì6, keeping them at 2 in the Pacific Division. With this, Doncic also remains the player with the highest average points this season: 35.Taking to social media after the game, Magic Johnson couldn‚Äôt contain his excitement. He wrote, ‚ÄúLeBron James was nothing short of spectacular scoring 11 straight points in the 4th quarter (including three straight 3-pointers) and had 29 total points tonight to defeat the Philadelphia 76ers 112-108!‚ÄùHe added, ‚ÄúThe NBA‚Äôs leading candidate for MVP, Luka Doncic, had a triple double with 31 points, 15 rebounds and 11 assists! The Lakers are the most entertaining team in the NBA right now. ‚ÄùMagic also highlighted the crowd‚Äôs reaction, a mix of awe and disbelief, as LeBron, Luka, and Austin Reaves traded big shots and dazzling plays throughout the night. For a fanbase that had been grumbling about inconsistency in recent weeks, the performance was a breath of fresh confidence.Due to Lakers‚Äô inconsistent performances, some critics suggested that the management should look beyond LeBron James, but Sunday night served as a timely reminder of his ageless magic and ability to flip momentum and lift the entire roster.Off the court, James continues to support community work. Recently, he partnered with Amazon to deliver holiday essentials to families supported by the LeBron James Family Foundation. Students at the I Promise School were also surprised with brand-new LeBron XXIII sneakers, another gesture highlighting how deeply he remains connected to the people who shaped him.At 40, LeBron is still defying expectations on the hardwood floors, but off the court, he continues to support and lift the communities.Also Read: ‚ÄúFamily‚Äù - LeBron James sends heartfelt message to fans from Toronto highlighting viral clip from post-ga
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers beat the philadelphia 76ers 112‚Äì108. Lebron james scored 29 points, 7 rebounds, and 6 assists. Luka doncic added a triple-double with 31 points, 15 rebounds, 11 assists. Magic johnson called the lakers 'the most entertaining team in the nba right now'

Article Title: Patrick Mahomes‚Äô knee injury sparks fan backlash after Chiefs‚Äô loss to Texans in Sunday Night Football
Article Text:
Patrick Mahomes‚Äô injury sparks backlash after Chiefs‚Äô loss to Texans (Image via: Getty Images)

Texans‚Äô defense dominates Chiefs while Patrick Mahomes struggles



Fans slam Patrick Mahomes as team battles uncertain 2025 season



The Kansas City Chiefs‚Äô 2025 season has been a nightmare so far, with early defeats setting a troubling tone for a team expected to dominate. Their latest loss against the Houston Texans has intensified fan frustration, leaving many questioning the team‚Äôs strategy, execution, and Patrick Mahomes ‚Äô role as the franchise quarterback.Patrick Mahomes, known for his clutch performances, faced harsh scrutiny after struggling throughout the game. His left knee, visibly injured during the matchup, became a hot topic among fans and analysts. While some believed Mahomes was using the injury as an excuse, others noted the relentless pressure from Houston‚Äôs defense, which left the Chiefs‚Äô offense struggling to find any rhythm.In the Sunday showdown, Mahomes completed just 14-of-33 passes for 160 yards and threw three critical interceptions, resulting in one of the lowest passer ratings of his career. The Texans‚Äô defense executed a perfect game plan, sacking and pressuring Mahomes relentlessly. During the third quarter, he was seen limping and using a heating pad on his left knee, fueling fan speculation that the injury might be exaggerated.Despite the backlash, reports confirm that Mahomes was indeed dealing with knee discomfort. However, the primary reason for the Chiefs‚Äô defeat was the Texans‚Äô defensive mastery.Kansas City‚Äôs offensive line struggled to protect their star quarterback, while turnovers and stalled drives ensured the Texans controlled the game from start to finish.Social media erupted with fans criticizing Patrick Mahomes, accusing him of exaggerating the knee injury to justify another loss. ‚ÄúPatrick Mahomes limps every game!! Like bro, we know you're faking! lol.,‚Äù one user wrote, while another added, ‚ÄúHe's been doing that for years.‚Äù Others defended him, emphasizing the immense pressure faced by a quarterback leading a team under-performing this season. The Chiefs‚Äô 2025 campaign continues to be a rollercoaster, and this latest defeat underscores the urgent need for better consistency and stronger offensive execution.Kansas City now turns its attention to Patrick Mahomes‚Äô recovery and the team‚Äôs ability to come together. With early-season struggles behind them, every upcoming game is crucial if the Chiefs hope to turn their 2025 campaign around and keep playoff hopes alive. The team will need stronger execution on both offense and defense to regain momentum and compete at the highest level.Also Read: Will Campbell injury update: Coach Mike Vrabel reveals rookie left tackle‚Äôs recovery progress, says ‚Äúso far, so good‚Äù
Article Summary: Kansas city chiefs' 2025 season has been a rollercoaster, with early defeats setting a troubling tone for a team expected to dominate. Their latest loss against the houston texans has intensified fan frustration, leaving many questioning the team‚Äôs strategy, execution, and patrick mahomes ‚Äô role as the franchise quarterback.

Article Title: Roger Federer and Mirka Federer combined net worth in 2025: Tennis legend, family life, career, and business
Article Text:
Roger Federer and Mirka Federer combined net worth in 2025: Tennis legend, family life, career, and business (Image via Getty)

Roger Federer net worth in 2025 and how he built his wealth



Mirka Federer net worth and her role in Roger Federer‚Äôs success



Roger Federer and Mirka Federer family life and children

Roger Federer career legacy, retirement, and life in 2025

Roger Federer is one of the biggest names in sports history. In 2025, the Swiss tennis legend is widely reported to be a billionaire. His money comes from tennis winnings, big brand deals, and smart business choices. His wife, Mirka Federer, has been by his side through every stage of his journey. Together, they have built a strong family, a global brand, and huge wealth that continues to grow even after retirement.Roger Federer‚Äôs net worth in 2025 is estimated between $1.1 billion and $1.3 billion, according to Forbes and Bloomberg. During his tennis career, Roger Federer earned about $130 million in official prize money from tournaments.However, most of his wealth came after tennis. His lifetime endorsement deal with Uniqlo, signed in 2018, is worth around $300 million. He also has long-standing partnerships with Rolex, Credit Suisse, and Wilson.One of his smartest moves was investing in the Swiss sports shoe company On in 2019. The brand grew fast, and its public listing added hundreds of millions to Federer‚Äôs value. This investment played a major role in his billionaire status.Mirka Federer, born Miroslava Vavrinec, is a former professional tennis player who represented Switzerland. She retired early due to injury but stayed deeply involved in tennis through Roger Federer‚Äôs career.Mirka Federer is known to manage travel, scheduling, and family decisions. While her personal net worth is not publicly listed, all major reports agree that the couple manages finances together. She is also involved in Roger Federer‚Äôs brand image and business direction.For many years, Mirka Federer was seen courtside at every match, playing a quiet but powerful role behind one of the greatest careers in sports.Roger Federer and Mirka Federer married in 2009. They have four children, two sets of twins. Their twin daughters, Myla Rose and Charlene Riva, were born in 2009. Their twin sons, Leo and Lenny, were born in 2014.The family lives mainly in Switzerland and values privacy. Since retiring in 2022, Roger Federer has said family time is his top priority. He often shares small moments from family trips and daily life but keeps his children away from heavy media attention.Roger Federer won 20 Grand Slam titles, including eight Wimbledon titles, the most in men‚Äôs tennis history. He spent 310 weeks as world No. 1, a record held for many years. He officially retired from tennis in 2022.In 2025, Roger Federer stays active through business, charity, and tennis events. He was recently seen at Wimbledon events and charity matches, but he has clearly stated there is no comeback planned. His Roger Federer Foundation continues to support children‚Äôs education in Africa and Switzerland.Also Read: Who Is Roger Federer's Wife Mirka Federer? All About Their Relationship, Family, Children, And Life Beyond Tennis
Article Summary: Roger federer is widely reported to be a billionaire in 2025. His money comes from tennis winnings, big brand deals, and smart business choices. His wife, mirka federer, has been by his side through every stage of his journey. Together, they have built a strong family, a global brand, and huge wealth.

Article Title: Philip Rivers‚Äô surprise comeback talks heat up as Colts scramble for answers following Daniel Jones injury setback
Article Text:
Philip Rivers emerges as unexpected Colts option (Imagn Images)

Philip Rivers emerges as the Colts‚Äô unexpected solution



Philip Rivers returned to the center of NFL conversations on Monday as the Colts searched for stability after a devastating blow to their season. With Daniel Jones sidelined for the year due to a torn Achilles, Indianapolis moved quickly to explore options that could keep its playoff hopes alive. That urgency led to a surprising development when NFL Network‚Äôs Ian Rapoport and Mike Garafolo reported that Rivers will visit the team facility on Tuesday for a workout. The news arrived on his 44th birthday, creating a moment that blended timing, nostalgia and the possibility of an unexpected comeback.Rivers last suited up in 2020, a season that many believed marked the close of his long career. In that lone year with the Colts, he pushed the franchise into the postseason and provided the leadership they needed at the time. He has since stayed around the game while coaching high school football at St. Michael Catholic in Fairhope, Alabama. That school is also home to Colts rookie Riley Leonard, who views Rivers as a mentor. Their connection adds meaning to a reunion that feels sudden but not entirely out of place for the franchise.The quarterback room collapsed quickly for Indianapolis. Jones‚Äôs season-ending injury followed the earlier loss of Anthony Richardson, who remains out with a fractured orbital bone.Leonard is expected to start this week against the Seahawks, but he is navigating a knee issue after stepping in during the game against Jacksonville. These problems backed the Colts into a corner, leaving them with few choices and pushing them toward Rivers, who has not taken an NFL snap in four years.Rapoport underscored the urgency by posting, "The Colts are planning to bring potential Hall of Fame QB Philip Rivers into their facility Tuesday to work out to see if he may join their practice squad, per me & Mike Garafolo. This is real. Daniel Jones‚Äô season is over, Riley Leonard will start, but Rivers may be an option." If he signs, he would instantly become the league‚Äôs oldest active player, edging out Aaron Rodgers.For a team trying to rescue a season slipping away, Rivers represents experience, calm and a familiar voice in the huddle. Now the Colts must decide whether this surprising path can guide them through the weeks ahead.Also Read: Madison Beer teases major career update as Justin Herbert prepares for crucial Chargers‚ÄìEagles showdown
Article Summary: Philip rivers will visit the team facility on tuesday for a workout. The news arrived on his 44th birthday, creating a moment that blended timing, nostalgia and the possibility of an unexpected comeback. Daniel jones‚Äô season is over, riley leonard will start, but rivers may be an option.

Article Title: Drake Maye‚Äôs wife Ann Maye‚Äôs homemade treats become Patriots talk of the week after Mike Vrabel‚Äôs unexpected comment
Article Text:
Drake Maye's wife Ann (Getty Images)

Ann Michael Maye‚Äôs TikTok baking fame fuels Patriots buzz



Ann Michael Maye (Ann Michael Maye/TikTok)

Drake Maye‚Äôs wife Ann Michael Maye has become a surprising highlight of the Patriots season, and it has nothing to do with football stats or playbooks. Her TikTok baking videos have turned into a daily event for fans, and the New England Patriots are getting a sweet taste of it, too. Coach Mike Vrabel revealed that the treats filling her feed are not only real but show up in the building, and he has tried some himself. With the team sitting at 11-2 and enjoying a bye week, Ann Michael kept her own streak alive with her steady flow of ‚ÄúBakemas‚Äù creations, including a cinnamon sourdough loaf that had viewers hooked.Fans have crowded her comments with praise, pushing her TikTok engagement past 2.5 million likes. Long before the latest surge, she was already baking themed treats for game days. Before the Patriots‚Äô last win, she made Patriots-style M&M and chocolate chip cookies, and she called Thanksgiving her ‚ÄúSuper Bowl.‚Äù Now the attention has shifted again after Vrabel admitted he sampled her apple crisp bars and said they were ‚Äúdelicious. ‚Äù He also said, ‚ÄúShe brings them in for the O-lineman.‚Äù That sounds like a pretty strong game plan on its own.The rest of the roster might be wondering when their turn is coming, but fans have gotten plenty to enjoy. Ann Michael has also made waves in the stands with outfits that grab attention, like her full New England blue look and the all-red Patriots style that drew compliments online. Her growing presence blends lifestyle, team pride and a sense of fun that Patriots supporters have embraced during an intense season.Her connection to football runs deeper than social media. Drake was a standout quarterback at North Carolina before becoming the No. 3 overall pick in the 2024 NFL Draft. Ann Michael attended college with him, and her brother Tad played quarterback alongside Drake. The two married on June 21 in North Carolina, beginning a new chapter just as Drake‚Äôs NFL journey took off.Now the Patriots turn to a huge matchup against the Buffalo Bills on December 14. If the O-line is powered by Ann Michael‚Äôs baked goods, Drake Maye might walk into Sunday with the sweetest protection in the league.Also Read: Former ‚ÄòFirst Take‚Äô star Molly Qerim turns heads in Abu Dhabi as her glamorous F1 race-day look proves she‚Äôs a style icon off-camera
Article Summary: Ann michael maye‚Äôs tiktok baking fame fuels patriots buzz. Coach mike vrabel revealed that the treats filling her feed are not only real but show up in the building. Ann michael has also made waves in the stands with outfits that grab attention.

Article Title: Jaylen Brown becomes focus of new NBA announcement following Boston Celtics‚Äô fifth consecutive win
Article Text:
Jaylen Brown. Image via: Eric Canha-Imagn Images

Jaylen Brown earns spotlight after NBA announcement



Boston Celtics thriving while Jayson Tatum recovers



The Boston Celtics walked out of their fifth straight victory with more than momentum in their pockets. Jaylen Brown, already carrying the bulk of the team‚Äôs offense this season, added another personal milestone as the NBA unveiled its latest honors. His surge has shaped Boston‚Äôs push up the standings, and the league‚Äôs announcement highlighted how central he has become during a stretch defined by heavy usage and consistent production. The recognition arrived as another marker in a season where Brown has stepped into a starring role.The NBA named Brown the Eastern Conference Player of the Week after he powered the Celtics through an undefeated run against the New York Knicks, Los Angeles Lakers, and Toronto Raptors. His numbers during that span reflected an elite rhythm in December first week: 34 points, 6.7 rebounds, and 5.7 assists on efficient splits from every level. Boston improved to 15-9 with the streak, climbing back into the top tier of the East.Jaylen Brown opened the week with a statement performance, adding 42 points on 66.7 percent shooting against the Knicks, the team that ended Boston‚Äôs 2025 postseason. His impact touched every part of the game, including a team-best plus/minus of plus-15.The Celtics noted the performance marked ‚ÄúBrown‚Äôs 14th career 40-point game, third of the season, and second in four days.‚ÄùEven an illness that kept him out against the Washington Wizards didn‚Äôt interrupt his rhythm. He returned to score back-to-back 30-point outings against the Lakers and Raptors, adding eight rebounds in both games. His recent stretch includes nine games with at least 20 points, fueling Boston‚Äôs rise.This season has also brought career-high averages across major categories. The absence of Jayson Tatum, who has been recovering from an Achilles injury, opened a window for Brown to run the offense. The departures of Al Horford, Jrue Holiday, and Kristaps Porzingis put even more weight on his shoulders. He has answered with efficient scoring, improved playmaking, and steady leadership.Head coach Joe Mazzulla has pushed the Celtics forward with a rotation built around Brown, Derrick White, Neemias Queta, Payton Pritchard, and Anfernee Simons. All but Simons are posting career-high scoring averages. The team sits fifth in net rating and second in offensive rating.After the win over Toronto, Mazzulla shrugged off questions about the standings, saying, ‚ÄúNo, it doesn‚Äôt mean anything. It doesn‚Äôt show you anything. There are ebbs and flows along the way in the league. At the end of the day, we have a clear identity of who we are.‚ÄùA late-season Tatum return remains possible, but Brown‚Äôs surge keeps Boston stable and dangerous.Also Read: Why Desmond Bane was fined? Orlando Magic guard hit with a whopping $35K penalty during loss to Knicks
Article Summary: The nba named jaylen brown the eastern conference player of the week. He powered the celtics through an undefeated run against the new york knicks, los angeles lakers, and toronto raptors. His numbers during that span reflected an elite rhythm in december first week: 34 points, 6.7 rebounds, and 5.7 assists.
